TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebResourceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebResourceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebResourceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义在程序集中启用嵌入资源的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that enables an embedded resource in an assembly.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是仅在程序集声明上使用时有效。The class is valid only when used on assembly declarations. 它用于启用用作 Web 资源的程序集中指定的嵌入的资源。It is used to enable a specified embedded resource in an assembly for use as a Web resource. 有关资源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 网页资源概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。For more information on resources, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将应用向定义了一个自定义控件的命名空间属性`MyCustomControl`。The first code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to a namespace that defines a custom control, `MyCustomControl`. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用`MyCustomControl`网页中的类。The second code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. 下面的代码示例演示如何应用上一个用于定义图像 Web 资源和 HTML Web 资源的自定义程序集的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute on a custom assembly to define an image Web resource and an HTML Web resource. `MyCustomControl`类定义使用的资源来设置的值的复合控件属性包含在复合控件内，若要设置的控件属性将链接到 HTML 资源的控制。The `MyCustomControl` class defines a composite control that uses the resources to set the value of the property of an control that is contained within the composite control and to set the property of an control linking to the HTML resource. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`MyCustomControl`网页中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 此示例需要使用包含的程序集编译的 Image1.jpg 和 Help.htm 资源`MyCustomControl`。This example requires that you compile the Image1.jpg and Help.htm resources with the assembly that contains `MyCustomControl`. 有关详细信息，请参阅， [/resource （C# 编译器选项）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md)或[/resource (Visual Basic 中)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource.md)。For more information, see, [/resource (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md) or [/resource (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource.md). 无法在此示例中使用 HTML Web 资源的示例显示下一步。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 请注意，使用`WebResource`语法，在你设置属性`true`Web 资源。Note the use of the `WebResource` syntax, which is used when you set the property to `true` for a Web resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``

Public Sub New (webResource As String, contentType As String)

span.span: The name of the of Web resource.

param.name: contentType
param.span: 资源类型，如 image/gif 或 text/javascript。

span.span: The type of resource, such as "image/gif" or "text/javascript".

summary.span: 使用指定的 Web 资源和资源内容类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified Web resource and resource content type.
is or an empty string ("").
\- or -

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CdnPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含 Web 资源的内容传送网络 (CDN) 的路径。

span.span: Gets or set the path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN) that contains Web resources.

value.span: 内容传递网络 (CDN) 的路径。

span.span: The path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CdnSupportsSecureConnection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值向 指示在使用 HTTPS 访问页时是否应使用与内容传送网络 (CDN) 路径的安全连接来访问脚本资源。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates to the whether a script resource should be accessed using a secure connection to the content delivery network (CDN) path when the page is accessed using HTTPS.

value.span: 如果应使用 HTTPS 访问 CDN，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the CDN should be accessed using HTTPS; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性检查是否应通过访问关联的脚本资源到 CDN 使用安全的连接 （使用 SSL）。Use the property to check whether the associated script resource should be accessed by the using a secure connection (using SSL) to a CDN. 通过使用属性，你可以从浏览器一条警告消息时避免 Web 应用程序尝试从支持 SSL 的 CDN 请求安全内容。By using the property, you can avoid a warning message from the browser when your Web application attempts to request secure content from a CDN that supports SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含由 类引用的资源的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets a string containing the MIME type of the resource that is referenced by the class.
The content type of the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容类型示例有`"image/jpeg"`和`"text/xml"`。Examples of content types are `"image/jpeg"` and `"text/xml"`. MIME 类型的详细信息，请转到[Internet 号码分配机构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988)Web 站点，并请参阅有关媒体类型部分。For more information on MIME types, go to the [Internet Assigned Numbers Authority](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988) Web site and refer to the section on media types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LoadSuccessExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 资源加载成功时使用的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

value.span: 成功加载 Web 资源时使用的表达式。

span.span: An expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PerformSubstitution { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值确定在处理由 类引用的嵌入资源的过程中是否分析其他 Web 资源 URL，并使用该资源的完整路径替换。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether, during processing of the embedded resource referenced by the class, other Web resource URLs are parsed and replaced with the full path to the resource.

value.span: 如果在对资源的处理过程中解析嵌入式资源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if embedded resources are resolved during processing of the resource; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果从程序集的响应情况下，资源进行流式处理，对中的嵌入资源的其他 Web 资源的引用可以需要解决在此时，如果属性设置为`true`。When a resource is streamed from the assembly to the response, references to other Web resources in the embedded resources can be resolved at this time, if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 在此示例中，与定义属性的 HTML 文件 Help.htm属性设置为`true`。In this example, the attribute of the HTML file Help.htm is defined with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 无法在此示例中使用 HTML Web 资源的示例显示下一步。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 请注意，`WebResource`设置时使用语法属性`true`资源。Note that the `WebResource` syntax is used when you set the property to `true` for the resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``

span.span: Gets a string containing the name of the resource that is referenced by the class.
The name of the resource.
